wikipedia_page.main: George Anthony Bartlett (born 14 March 1998) is an English cricketer who plays for Somerset County Cricket Club. He made his first-class debut for the county in the 2017 County Championship against Warwickshire on 5 September 2017. He made his List A debut on 24 April 2019, for Somerset in the 2019 Royal London One-Day Cup. He made his Twenty20 debut on 30 August 2020, for Somerset in the 2020 t20 Blast.
